Values.Title: no
Values.Description: Only the required items and locations to beat the game will be guaranteed to be reachable in logic.

Values.Title: yes
Values.Description: Bombchus are properly considered in logic.

Values.Title: medallions
Values.Description: The bridge to Ganon's Castle appears after a set number of medaillons is obtained.

Values.Title: dungeons
Values.Description: The bridge to Ganon's Castle appears after a set number of medaillons and/or Spiritual Stones are obtained.

Values.Title: open
Values.Description: The bridge to Ganon's Castle is there from the start of the game.

Values.Title: stones
Values.Description: The bridge to Ganon's Castle appears after a set number of Spiritual Stones is obtained.

Values.Title: vanilla
Values.Description: The bridge to Ganon's Castle appears after the Shadow Medaillon, Spirit Medaillon and Light Arrows are obtained.

Values.Title: tokens
Values.Description: The bridge to Ganon's Castle appears after a set amount of Gold Skulltulas Tokens are obtained.
The bridge to Ganon's Castle appears after any Spiritual Stone is obtained.
The bridge to Ganon's Castle appears after any two Spiritual Stones are obtained.
The bridge to Ganon's Castle appears after all three Spiritual Stones are obtained.
The bridge to Ganon's Castle appears after any one medallion is obtained.
The bridge to Ganon's Castle appears after any two medallions are obtained.
The bridge to Ganon's Castle appears after any three medallions are obtained.
The bridge to Ganon's Castle appears after any four medallions are obtained.
The bridge to Ganon's Castle appears after any five medallions are obtained.
The bridge to Ganon's Castle appears after all medallions are obtained.
The bridge to Ganon's Castle appears after any one medallion or Spiritual Stone is obtained.
The bridge to Ganon's Castle appears after any two rewards out of all nine medaillions and Spiritual Stones are obtained.
The bridge to Ganon's Castle appears after any three rewards out of all nine medaillions and Spiritual Stones are obtained.
The bridge to Ganon's Castle appears after any four rewards out of all nine medaillions and Spiritual Stones are obtained.
The bridge to Ganon's Castle appears after any five rewards out of all nine medaillions and Spiritual Stones are obtained.
The bridge to Ganon's Castle appears after any six rewards out of all nine medaillions and Spiritual Stones are obtained.
The bridge to Ganon's Castle appears after any seven rewards out of all nine medaillions and Spiritual Stones are obtained.
The bridge to Ganon's Castle appears after any eight rewards out of all nine medaillions and Spiritual Stones are obtained.
The bridge to Ganon's Castle appears after of all nine medaillions and Spiritual Stones are obtained.
The bridge to Ganon's Castle appears after 10 Gold Skulltulas Tokens are obtained.
The bridge to Ganon's Castle appears after 20 Gold Skulltulas Tokens are obtained.
The bridge to Ganon's Castle appears after 30 Gold Skulltulas Tokens are obtained.
The bridge to Ganon's Castle appears after 40 Gold Skulltulas Tokens are obtained.
The bridge to Ganon's Castle appears after 50 Gold Skulltulas Tokens are obtained.
Find 15 Triforce Pieces to finish the game.
Find 30 Triforce Pieces to finish the game.
Find 45 Triforce Pieces to finish the game.
Find 60 Triforce Pieces to finish the game.
Find 75 Triforce Pieces to finish the game.

Values.Title: yes
Values.Description: All masks are already sold, both the Skull Mask and the Mask of Truth are available after you give Zelda's Letter to the guard.

Values.Title: no
Values.Description: The mask quest is not complete, giving Zelda's Letter to the guard opens the shop.

Values.Title: yes
Values.Description: Chests will be large if they contain a major item and small if they don't.

Values.Title: double
Values.Description: Link takes double the damage.

Values.Title: quadruple
Values.Description: Link takes quadruple the damage.

Values.Title: half
Values.Description: Link takes half the damage.

Values.Title: simple indoors
Values.Description: Shuffle Great Fairies and Houses entrances except Temple of Time, Link's House, Windmill and Kakariko Potion Shop.

Values.Title: all
Values.Description: Shuffle Great Fairies and all Houses entrances.

Values.Title: yes
Values.Description: Dungeon entrances are shuffled with eachother, including Bottom of the Well, Ice Cavern, and Gerudo Training Grounds.

Values.Title: yes
Values.Description: Grotto entrances are shuffled with eachother, including all graves.

Values.Title: none
Values.Description: Gossip Stones give no hints.

Values.Title: Stone of Agony
Values.Description: The Stone of Agony is required to read the Gossip Stones hints.

Values.Title: plentiful
Values.Description: Extra major items are added.

Values.Title: scarce
Values.Description: Some excess items are removed, including health upgrades.

Values.Title: minimal
Values.Description: Most excess items are removed.

Values.Title: yes
Values.Description: Dungeons have exactly one major item except Spirit Temple which has _two_ items to match vanilla distribution.

Values.Title: no
Values.Description: The Door of Time is closed and will open if you play Song of Time in front of it.

Values.Title: closed deku
Values.Description: Mido blocks the path to the Deku Tree, requiring Kokiri Sword and Deku Shield to access the Deku Tree.

Values.Title: closed
Values.Description: Completing Deku Tree is needed to get out of Kokiri Forest.
Shops have 1 random non-shop item. It will always be on the left side.
Shops have 2 random non-shop items. They will always be on the left side.
Shops have 3 random non-shop items. They will always be on the left side.
Shops have 4 random non-shop items. They will always be on the left side.

Values.Title: random
Values.Description: Every shop will have a random number of non-shop items up to a maximum of 4.

Values.Title: yes
Values.Description: Adds a pack of 10 beans to the item pool, and the Magic Bean Salesman now sells a random item once at the price of 60 Rupees.

Values.Title: vanilla
Values.Description: Boss Keys will appear in their vanilla locations.

Values.Title: remove
Values.Description: Boss Keys are removed and all Boss doors are unlocked.

Values.Title: overworld
Values.Description: Boss Keys will appear in the overworld.

Values.Title: any dungeon
Values.Description: Boss Keys will appear in dungeons only.

Values.Title: anywhere
Values.Description: Boss Keys can appear anywhere in the world.

Values.Title: yes
Values.Description: Playing Epona's song in front of cows gives an item.
All medallions are required to activate the Light Arrow cutscene.

Values.Title: vanilla Light Arrow cutscene
Values.Description: Ganon's Castle Boss Key is on the Light Arrow cutscene which unlocks when you get both Shadow and Spirit medallions.

Values.Title: Medallions Light Arrow cutscene
Values.Description: Ganon's Castle Boss Key is on the Light Arrow cutscene which unlocks when you get a set number of medallions.

Values.Title: dungeon
Values.Description: Ganon's Castle Boss Key can only appear inside Ganon's Castle.

Values.Title: overworld
Values.Description: Ganon's Castle Boss Key can only appear in the overworld.

Values.Title: Any dungeon
Values.Description: Ganon's Castle Boss Key can only appear in a dungeon.

Values.Title: anywhere
Values.Description: Ganon's Castle Boss Key can appear anywhere in the world.

Values.Title: yes
Values.Description: Shuffles the Gerudo Card into the item pool.

Values.Title: yes
Values.Description: Shuffles the Fairy Ocarina and the Ocarina of Time into the item pool.

Values.Title: affordable
Values.Description: All Deku Scrubs sell an item for 10 rupees each.

Values.Title: vanilla
Values.Description: Small Keys will appear in their vanilla locations.

Values.Title: remove
Values.Description: Small Keys are removed and all locked doors in dungeons will be unlocked, except Boss Door.

Values.Title: overworld
Values.Description: Small Keys will only appear in the overworld.

Values.Title: Any dungeon
Values.Description: Small Keys will only appear in dungeons.

Values.Title: anywhere
Values.Description: Small Keys can appear anywhere in the world.

Values.Title: Anywhere
Values.Description: Shuffles the songs into the rest of the item pool.

Values.Title: Dungeon rewards
Values.Description: Songs appear at the end of dungeons, and an additional one at Zelda's Lullaby location.

Values.Title: yes
Values.Description: Enabling this shuffles the Weird Egg from Malon into the pool.

Values.Title: adult
Values.Description: Link starts as adult in Temple of Time.

Values.Title: dungeons
Values.Description: Token rewards from Gold Skulltulas within dungeons are shuffled into the pool.

Values.Title: overworld
Values.Description: Token rewards from Gold Skulltulas outside of dungeons are shuffled into the pool.

Values.Title: all tokens
Values.Description: Every Gold Skulltula token is shuffled into the pool.

Values.Title: open for adult
Values.Description: King Zora is always moved in the adult era.

Values.Title: always open
Values.Description: King Zora starts as moved in both the child and adult eras.

Values.Title: open
Values.Description: The bridge in Gerudo Valley is already rebuilt.

Values.Title: yes
Values.Description: Pieces of the Triforce have been scattered around the world. Find the required amount to finish the game!

Values.Title: yes
Values.Description: Start having already met Zelda and obtained Zelda's Letter along with the song from Impa.

Values.Title: yes
Values.Description: Pulling out the Ocarina near a spot at which Pierre can spawn will do so, without needing the song.

Values.Title: yes
Values.Description: Start the game with maxed out Deku Sticks and Deku Nuts.

Values.Title: yes
Values.Description: Anju will give a reward for collecting a random number of Cuccos.

Values.Title: no
Values.Description: The Kokiri Sword is at its vanilla location.
One random trial in Ganon's Castle is active and need to be completed to reach Ganon's Tower.
Two random trials in Ganon's Castle are active and need to be completed to reach Ganon's Tower.

Values.Title: yes
Values.Description: Randomize where Kaepora Gaebora (the Owl) drops you at when you talk to him at Lake Hylia or at the top of Death Mountain Trail.

Values.Title: yes
Values.Description: Randomize where each of the 6 warp songs leads to.

Values.Title: no
Values.Description: Child link starts at his house and Adult Link starts at Temple of Time when loading a save in the overworld.

Values.Title: vanilla
Values.Description: Maps and Compasses are in their vanilla location. Maps will tell if a dungeon is Master Quest, Compasses will tell what medaillion or Stone is within.

Values.Title: dungeon
Values.Description: Maps and Compasses are shuffled in their dungeon. Maps will tell if a dungeon is Master Quest, Compasses will tell what medaillion or Stone is within.

Values.Title: overworld
Values.Description: Maps and Compasses are shuffled in the overworld. Maps will tell if a dungeon is Master Quest, Compasses will tell what medaillion or Stone is within.

Values.Title: Any dungeon
Values.Description: Maps and Compasses are shuffled in all dungeons. Maps will tell if a dungeon is Master Quest, Compasses will tell what medaillion or Stone is within.

Values.Title: Anywhere
Values.Description: Maps and Compasses are shuffled anywhere. Maps will tell if a dungeon is Master Quest, Compasses will tell what medaillion or Stone is within.
One dungeon is the Master Quest version.
